hackathon-description-text: This is a hackathon that is geared primarily towards Devpost employees, however registrations and submissions are open to all that want to hack on Devpost.
hackathon-eligibility: You're eligible for this hackathon if you create a submission on Devpost using your Devpost user account.
hackathon-requirements: It should be Devpost related. Also, we're adhering to the
hackathon-rules: Don't hack the Gibson. Do hack the planet.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Maximum of four dinners will be awarded to Devpost employees, either as individual winners or as two pairs of winners.
Order off seamless, bill it to Devpost (assuming you're a Devpost employee)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=433 W 14th St, New York, NY 10014, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: The panel of judges will award prizes based off how awesome the hack is. It's as simple as that.

hackathon-location-address: 433 W 14th St, New York, NY 10014, USA
hackathon-description-header: Hack on the platform or hack the company, just don't hack the Gibson.
